TutorialScript.TutorialStep: Time: Lunchtime. Place: Quad. Only two days 'till Prom, and Naomi still has plenty of work to do.
If Naomi wants to have a shot at that tiara, she's gonna have to get people to start being nice to *her* for a change.
Her friend Cassandra seems like a reasonable place to start...
Except of course for the fact that the entire school is whispering about Buzz and Cassandra making out under the bleachers.
Zack's been jockying for Naomi's favor for weeks now, in a personal vendetta against prom king rival Buzz. Perhaps Zack could be used as a weapon of vengence?
But Zack's an arrogant so-and-so. What about that foreign exchange student, Gunter? He doesn't have many friends--wouldn't becoming prom king be a fun story for him to bring back home?
Or maybe Naomi should just stick to doing what she does best--making sure everyone else is getting along... though certain individuals who won't be named seem to insist on being miserable.
Well, whatever's going to happen, there's nothing to it but to do it!
